gft.api
Class Instrument

java.lang.Object
  gft.api.Instrument
All Implemented Interfaces:
common.util.storable.Storable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Instrument2, SpotInstrument
public abstract class Instrument
extends java.lang.Object
implements common.util.storable.Storable, java.lang.Cloneable

The Instrument class is the superclass of all types of instruments, supported by the system

Author:
Boris Malkin
See Also:
Session.listAvailableInstruments(), Session.listSelectedInstruments()
